solution_line_template: First, find the price of the sandwiches ${sandwich_price} per sandwich * {num_sandwiches} sandwiches = $<<{sandwich_price}*{num_sandwiches}={sandwiches_total_price}>>{sandwiches_total_price}.
Now add in the delivery fee ${sandwiches_total_price} + ${delivery_fee} = $<<{sandwiches_total_price}+{delivery_fee}={price_with_delivery}>>{price_with_delivery}.
Add the tip to the price of the sandwiches ${price_with_delivery} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{price_with_delivery}+{tip_amount}={total_received}>>{total_received} in total.
